name: Web Development
tagline: Full-Stack Solutions, From Concept to Deployment

description: I have extensive experience in desktop application development across Windows, macOS, and Linux platforms. description: I provide embedded system development services, covering complete solutions from hardware interface design to low-level software development. name: Secondary Development
description: I provide secondary development services, including legacy system modernization, feature expansion, performance optimization, and architecture refactoring. While maintaining business continuity, I migrate old technology stacks to modern architectures, improving system maintainability and scalability while reducing technical debt.

name: Consulting Services
description: Based on 30 years of project experience, I provide comprehensive technical consulting services, including requirements analysis, technology selection, architecture design, project management, code review, and risk control. I can help your team develop technology roadmaps, solve complex technical challenges, and improve development efficiency and code quality.
